Other.Description: - Respawn time at 20min reduced from 50s to 45s (was 40s previous patch)
- Zipline Boost cooldown reduced from 340s (5.6min) to 280s (4.6min)
- Fixed certain player name lengths not being reportable

Abilities.Description: - {{AbilityIcon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb damage spirit scaling reduced from 0.7 to 0.6
- {{AbilityIcon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb T3 damage reduced from +60 to +50
- {{AbilityIcon|Kudzu Bomb}} Kudzu Bomb vertical radius is now a fixed 2m pancake shape instead of the full radius of the ability
- {{AbilityIcon|Air Drop}} Air Drop explosion now respects line of sight
- {{AbilityIcon|Tornado}} Tornado time for victims to reach max height reduced from 0.3s to 0.2s
- {{AbilityIcon|Tornado}} Tornado lift duration reduced from 1.2s to 1.1s
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Tornado}} Tornado being castable while busy (such as while channeling {{AbilityIcon|Traveler}} Traveler)
- {{AbilityIcon|Djinn's Mark}} Djinn's Mark T1 now only applies the slow when the multiplier is 2x or higher
- {{AbilityIcon|Djinn's Mark}} Djinn's Mark damage is now treated as a DoT in terms of zipline rules (doesn't prevent ziplining or knock you off)
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Djinn's Mark}} Djinn's Mark applying bullet procs with {{AbilityIcon|Return Fire}} Return Fire
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Mystic Reverb}} Mystic Reverb causing {{AbilityIcon|Affliction}} Affliction damage be lethal
